resources.string: THIS A PRIVATE ORGANIZATION. IT IS NOT PART OF THE DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE OR ANY OF ITS COMPONENTS AND IT HAS NO GOVERNMENTAL STATUS.

1. A2D2 is a volunteer organization of airmen dedicated to reducing the number of DUIs in the Air Force. Use of this program should be your last resort, not your Plan A.

2. If you find yourself with no safe alternative, simply press the “Request Driver” button. The app will use your current GPS location and you will receive a notification when a driver is dispatched.

3. A2D2 drivers will only transport you to your home address. If you are making a request on behalf of a group, the driver is only required to take the group to a single address. If members of the group need to go to multiple homes, those individuals will need to make separate pickup requests.
Use Location?\n\nThis app wants to change
You have not allowed the A2D2 app to access your GPS location. Without this permission, the app cannot function. Please go to your phone settings and enable the GPS permission.
Are you sure you want to dispatch a driver to your current location?
